name: Finesse (F)
description: You may use your STR or DEX when attacking with this weapon.

name: Loading (L)
description: You must forgo moving to reload this weapon.

name: Thrown (Th)
description: You may throw this weapon to make a ranged attack with it using STR or DEX.

name: Two-handed (2H)
description: You must use this weapon with two hands.

name: Versatile (V)
description: You can use this weapon with one or two hands. Use the higher damage die if youâ€™re wielding it with two.
